content.raw:
Judging by the diffs it seems to look fine. I agree with @hsu that the line in CMakeLists.txt should be removed. Sorry about the stuff in my fork, I very quickly tried to address this problem, but never really got to it. I will try to build this and accept when I can verify that it seems to work on my end. 

Edit: It seems to work as expected, approved.
